name: Avenger's Breastplate
tooltip:
Avenger's BreastplateLevel 60

Bring the the Carapace of the Old God, 2 Idols of the Sage, 5 Silver Scarabs and 5 Bone Scarabs to Vethsera inside Ahn'Qiraj.  You must also attain Honored reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Carapace of the Old God
- Idol of the Sage x 2
- Silver Scarab x 5
- Bone Scarab x 5
- Brood of Nozdormu:
